thing-type.label: HAC01 In-Wall Remote Insert
thing-type.description: In-Wall Remote Insert<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThere are many application for the module ,</p&gt <p&gtone application is connect the 2 wire of manual switch input to most of the wall switch sell in the market , while the connected wall switch been switched ON or OFF , the module will send the correspond signal to the associated devices like Z-Wave switch module HAN01 or any Z-Wave ON/OFF or dimmer modul</p&gt <p&gtAnother application is connect this module to any traditional wire sensor which has NC/NO manual switch input output, and this will easily convert those wire sensors into wireless Z-wave sensors. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing link button three times within 1.5 seconds will enter inclusion mode. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing link button three times within 1.5 seconds will enter exclusion mode.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Set Level
parameter.description: The Basic Set Command is sent with this value.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Basic Set Command is sent with value to have the receiving device recognize the value for controlled level, for example, if the Basic Set Command sent to dimmer with value, the dimmer would activate the luminance according to the value. <br /&gt<br /&gt0 : Off<br /&gt1 – 99 : On (for Binary Switch Device); Dim Level (for Multilevel Switch Device)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Amount Of Delay
parameter.description: Amount Of Delay (seconds) to send the Basic Set Off command.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis is applied to determine the delay time setting to send the Basic Set Off command when the manual switch input at NO (open). <br /&gt<br /&gtExample : <br /&gt0 : immediately Off <br /&gt1 – 127 : delay 1 ~ 127 second to Off</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Switch Input Change
parameter.description: Target nodes that receive Basic Set command when the switch input changed.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe remote module supports association with maximum 5 node for Grouping 1. Grouping 1 supports BASIC_SET.</p&gt <p&gtWhen the manual switch input is from NC to NO or from NO to NC, HAC01 would send Basic Set Command to the nodes in Grouping 1 to On or Off the controlled device. Basic Set Command:</p&gt <p&gtManual switch input at NC: Command Class Basic, Basic Set, Value = 0xFF(255)</p&gt <p&gtManual switch input at NO: Command Class Basic, Basic Set, Value = 0x00(0)</p&gt
